mapper.select: SELECT recording_id, user_id, date, title, content, member, remarks, status_id, update_date, version FROM recordings WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status_id = #{statusId} ORDER BY date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recordings(user_id, date, title, content,member,remarks,status_id,update_date,version) VALUES(#{userId}, #{date}, #{title}, #{content}, #{member},#{remarks},#{statusId},#{updateDate},#{version});
